Heartbleed
Team 50s 3307 Group Project. A platformer game where you, the user, is spawned in as a computer bug with the goal of infiltrating and infecting the computer system. Navigate through the terrain, avoid/defeat enemies, enjoy a beautiful soundtrack and attempt to conquer the final boss.

Detailed Description

Manages and renders a tile-based UI layout using a JSON file for configuration.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ UI()

UI::UI ( const std::string & jsonFile)

Constructs the UI by reading tile data from a JSON file.

Constructs the UI from a JSON configuration file.

Parameters
jsonFilePath to the UI layout JSON file.

Parses the given JSON file for UI tile definitions and initializes the corresponding textures and tile objects.

Parameters
jsonFilePath to the JSON file containing UI layout and tile data.
